sources.title: Casper's Spree Under the Sea (1950)
sources.description: Casper is kicked out of the Society of Ghosts when he admits he does not like scaring people. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/caspers-spree-under-the-sea-1950/

metadata.Plot: Casper is kicked out of the Society of Ghosts when he admits he does not like scaring people. Dejected, desperate and friendless, he decides to drown himself. And, evidently, confused, also. There, he discovers that he has friends among the fish. When all of his new friends, including Goldie, the pretty goldfish, are caught in the net of two fishermen, Casper rises to the occasion and the surface, frightens the two fishermen away, and becomes a hero to the fish.
metadata.Actors: Sid Raymond, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
